attributes.action: Extend the businesses rates holiday for the 2021-22 tax year.
attributes.additional_details:
Retail, hospitality and leisure businesses have welcomed the Government’s efforts in providing a business rates holiday for the 2020/21 tax year.
These businesses need extra support for the upcoming tax year to secure jobs and livelihoods
attributes.background: Extend the current business rates holiday scheme for retail, hospitality and leisure businesses, to include the 2021 to 2022 tax year.
